title: Device Selection and Usage Guidelines for Light Therapy

questions.question: What is the main difference between LED and laser devices in light therapy?
choices: LED devices emit coherent light, while lasers emit non-coherent light
LED devices cover a broader area, while lasers produce a narrow, focused beam
LED devices have higher power density compared to lasers
Laser devices are more suitable for home use than LED devices
questions.answer: LED devices cover a broader area, while lasers produce a narrow, focused beam
